author: Rachel Bishop, Patrick Lion
description: At least 19 people were killed and 50 others injured in the blast - which witnesses are claiming was caused by a 'nail bomb'
title: Girls' piercing screams as huge explosion rings out through Manchester Arena

author: By Julian Robinson
description: Officers are combing CCTV to determine whether the suicide bomber carried out a 'recce' of Manchester Arena before detonating a deadly nail bomb last night.
title: Suicide bomber who slaughtered 22 'was known to police'
